publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6913 Stewart Maxwell: Israeli and Palestinian Peace Talks—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that the Israelis and Palestinians are to resume peace talks; congratulates Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Palestinian National Authority President Mahmoud Abbas on what it considers a courageous move, and wishes the peace talks every success. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Mike Pringle*, Brian Adam*, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Butler*, Bill Kidd*, Jackson Carlaw*

S3M-6913 Stewart Maxwell: Israeli and Palestinian Peace Talks—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that the Israelis and Palestinians are to resume peace talks; congratulates Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Palestinian National Authority President Mahmoud Abbas on what it considers a courageous move, and wishes the peace talks every success. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-6913 Israeli and Palestinian Peace Talks (lodged on 6 September 2010) Maureen Watt*

S3M-6913 Stewart Maxwell: Israeli and Palestinian Peace Talks—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that the Israelis and Palestinians are to resume peace talks; congratulates Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Palestinian National Authority President Mahmoud Abbas on what it considers a courageous move, and wishes the peace talks every success. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Mike Pringle, Brian Adam, Robin Harper, Rob Gibson, Bill Butler, Bill Kidd, Jackson Carlaw, Jamie Hepburn, Jim Tolson, Maureen Watt
